metaInfo.title: Learn How to Design OTT Platform?
metaInfo.desc: Enroll in the Full stack course Event and learn from live classes. Get Knowledge by working on industry projects.

mainData.title: Learn How to Design OTT Platform

aboutUs.title: About the Masterclass
aboutUs.desc: Are you looking to get ahead in the era of technology? Learn how to design an OTT platform that stands out.
aboutUs.desc1: Join us for this free masterclass hosted by Vishwanath Pratap Singh who is currently a SDE at Disney+Hotstar.
aboutUs.desc2: At this workshop, you will gain hands-on insights on designing effective OTT platforms and apps, keeping user experience and Interface at forefront. This masterclass helps working professionals who is seeking for carrer transition from service based companies to Product based companies such as Netflix, Disney + Hotstar and  Amazon prime while freshers get career guidance to land on their dream job.

feature.title: Full Stack Masterclass Features
feature.p1: Fulfill your learning goals and get expert assistance.
feature.p2: Get 100% live sessions led by Full stack experts.
feature.p3: Attend the training and get acknowledged certification.

profile.list3: Worked on Hotstarx project for Android app and AndroidTV.
profile.list4: Worked with Samsung, Panasonic, and MakeMyTrip.
profile.list5: Worked on architecture, development, and unit testing for Android.

whyUs.title: What will you Learn?
whyUs.l1: Get insights on databases, caches, load balancers, etc.
whyUs.l2: Learn the architecture of OTT platforms.
whyUs.l3: Career transition to Product based companies.
whyUs.l4: Technique to approach System Design interview questions.

whoCan.title: This masterclass is for
whoCan.para1: Software developers who are aiming to accelerate their respective careers by upskilling with Full stack development.
whoCan.para2: Professionals, irrespective of their domains, who have great enthusiasm to make a career transition into Full stack    development.
whoCan.para3: Skillslash Academy is an ed-tech company, founded by alumni of IIT Kharagpur.

About.title: About Skillslash Academy
About.desc: Skillslash Academy is an ed-tech company, founded by alumni of IIT Kharagpur.
About.para1: We provide project-based certification platform for professionals. Being the leading training provider, we give you the opportunity to work directly with industry experts on latest projects.
About.para2: We provide real-time work experience, Guaranteed job referral, customizable courses and project certification from top startups.
About.para3: Our training allows you to develop your abilities and get employed in top businesses. We aim at upgrading your skill set and get first preference in the hiring process.
